alert.note: Alert for Aguila Valley; Buckeye, Avondale; Cave Creek, New River; Central Phoenix; Deer Valley; East Valley; Fountain Hills, East Mesa; New River Mesa; North Phoenix, Glendale; Northwest Valley; Scottsdale, Paradise Valley; South Mountain, Ahwatukee; Southeast Valley, Queen Creek; Tonopah Desert (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued October 16 at 7:33AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH WILL EXPIRE AT 8 AM MST THIS MORNING... The Flash Flood Watch will expire for a portion of south central Arizona, including the following areas, Aguila Valley, Buckeye/Avondale, Cave Creek/New River, Central Phoenix, Deer Valley, East Valley, Fountain Hills/East Mesa, New River Mesa, North Phoenix/Glendale, Northwest Valley, Scottsdale/Paradise Valley, South Mountain/Ahwatukee, Southeast Valley/Queen Creek and Tonopah Desert. The flash flooding threat has ended. Therefore, the Flash Flood Watch will expire at 8 AM MST this morning.
